keywords.name: Log Screenshot
keywords.shortdoc: *DEPRECATED* Use `Take Screenshot` or `Take Screenshot Without Embedding` instead.

keywords.name: Save Screenshot
keywords.shortdoc: *DEPRECATED* Use `Take Screenshot` or `Take Screenshot Without Embedding` instead.

keywords.name: Save Screenshot To
keywords.shortdoc: *DEPRECATED* Use `Take Screenshot` or `Take Screenshot Without Embedding` instead.

keywords.name: Set Screenshot Directory
keywords.shortdoc: Sets the directory where screenshots are saved.

keywords.name: Take Screenshot
keywords.shortdoc: Takes a screenshot in JPEG format and embeds it into the log file.

keywords.name: Take Screenshot Without Embedding
keywords.shortdoc: Takes a screenshot and links it from the log file.
